<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157187</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2893</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Sample Projects- PIE Teachers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beispielprojekte TORTE Lehrer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Professeurs de PÂTÉ EN CROÛTE de Projets 
D'Échantillon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Professores da TORTA Dos Projetos Da Amostra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Insegnanti della TORTA Di Progetti Del Campione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προγράμματα δειγμάτων - δάσκαλοι ΠΙΤΩΝ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Profesores de la EMPANADA De los Proyectos De la 
Muestra</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Projects for Highschool- The Pie for Teachers website aims to provide guidance and support for teachers in Israeli high schools in the planning, implementation and assessment of project work as required by the English Inspectorate for the New Bagrut Assessment</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">projects</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">matriculation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">assessment</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Projekte für Highschool-, welches die Torte für 
Lehrerweb site darauf abzielt, Anleitung und Unterstützung für 
Lehrer in den israelischen High School in der Planung zu geben, 
Implementierung und Einschätzung der Projektarbeit wie von dem 
englischen Inspektorat für die neue Bagrut Einschätzung gefordert</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Projets pour Highschool- que le pâté en croûte 
pour le site Web de professeurs vise à fournir les conseils et le 
support pour des professeurs dans les lycées israéliens dans la 
planification, mise en place et évaluation de travail de projet selon
les exigences de l'inspection anglaise pour la nouvelle évaluation de
Bagrut</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Projetos para Highschool- que a torta para o Web 
site dos professores aponta fornecer a orientação e a sustentação 
para professores em High Schools israeli no planeamento, execução e 
avaliação do trabalho de projeto como necessário pelo inspectorate 
inglês para a avaliação nova de Bagrut</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Progetti per Highschool- che la torta per il Web 
site degli insegnanti mira a fornire il consiglio ed il supporto per 
gli insegnanti in High Schooi israeliane nella progettazione, 
l'implementazione e la valutazione di di progetto di lavoro secondo le
esigenze dell'ispettorato inglese per la nuova valutazione di Bagrut</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προγράμματα για Highschool - η πίτα για τον ιστοχώρο
δασκάλων στοχεύει να παρέχει τις οδηγίες και την υποστήριξη για 
τους δασκάλους στα ισραηλινά γυμνάσια στον προγραμματισμό, την 
εφαρμογή και την αξιολόγηση της εργασίας προγράμματος όπως 
απαιτείται από την αγγλική επιθεώρηση για τη νέα αξιολόγηση 
Bagrut</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Proyectos para Highschool- que la empanada para el
Web site de los profesores apunta proporcionar a la dirección y a la 
ayuda para los profesores en High Schools secundarias israelíes en 
las hojas de operación (planning), la puesta en práctica y el 
gravamen del trabajo de proyecto según los requisitos del 
inspectorado inglés para el nuevo gravamen de Bagrut</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Projekte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">matriculation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einschätzung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">projets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">immatriculation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">évaluation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">projetos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">matriculation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">avaliação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">progetti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">matriculation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">valutazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προγράμματα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εγγραφή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αξιολόγηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">proyectos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">matriculation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gravamen</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
